name: Pecan Carmel Clusters
author: Barbara
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package individually wrapped caramels, unwrapped
1 pound dark chocolate, broken into small pieces
directions: Place caramels, butter, and water in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave on high, stirring every 30 seconds, until smooth, about 3 minutes
Drop caramel pecan mixture by spoonfuls onto parchment paper
Place in freezer for 15 to 20 minutes
Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on high, stirring every 15 seconds, until melted and smooth, 1 to 2 minutes
Dip each caramel cluster into chocolate using a fondue fork until coated; place on parchment paper to dry
